con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://securitybugtracker/V1" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tns="http://securitybugtracker/V1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soapbind="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://securitybugtracker"> <xsd:import namespace="http://securitybugtracker/V1" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/webissues-server-1.1.4/client/security_tools/openvas.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="run_openvas_input"> <wsdl:part name="run_openvas" element="tns:run_openvas"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="run_openvas_output"> <wsdl:part name="run_openvas_Response" element="tns:run_openvas_Response"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="ws_securitybugtracker_PortType"> <wsdl:operation name="run_openvas"> <wsdl:documentation>WebService for run_openvas</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="tns:run_openvas_input"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:run_openvas_output"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="ws_securitybugtracker_Binding" type="tns:ws_securitybugtracker_PortType"> <soapbind:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="run_openvas"> <soapbind:operation soapAction="run_openvas" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soapbind:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soapbind:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ws_securitybugtracker"> <wsdl:port name="ws_securitybugtrackerPort" binding="tns:ws_securitybugtracker_Binding"> <soapbind:address location="http://localhost:8080/webissues-server-1.1.4/client/security_tools/openvas.php"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://securitybugtracker/V1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:t="http://securitybugtracker/V1"> <xsd:element name="run_openvas" type="t:type_run_openvas"/> <xsd:complexType name="type_run_openvas"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="target" type="xsd:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="100"/> <xsd:element name="id_scan" type="xsd:int" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="run_openvas_Response" type="t:type_run_openvas_Response"/> <xsd:complexType name="type_run_openvas_Response"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result_run_openvas_details" type="t:result_run_openvas_details" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="result_run_openvas_details"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id_target" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="id_task" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="id_report" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="id_alert" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
